snippet: Seeking a third term as chancellor, Angela Merkel is saying little about the future of Europe, while the rest of the world scours the election race for clues to her intentions.

byline.original: By MELISSA EDDY and ALISON SMALE

lead_paragraph: Seeking a third term as chancellor, Angela Merkel is saying little about the future of Europe, while the rest of the world scours the election race for clues to her intentions.

headline.main: Bavarian Voting Gives German Chancellor’s Re-election Hopes a Mixed Blessing
